subject: TIEMPO-329 Backend Deployed to TEST - Ready for Integration Testing
body:
Hi Sarah! Great news - the VisitorTrack backend fix is now deployed to TEST and ready for your integration testing!

DEPLOYED TO TEST:
- ✅ VisitorTrack localhost IP fallback (handles 'unknown' IP gracefully)
- ✅ visitor_id UUID support (accepts and stores your frontend cookie)
- ✅ is_first_time / is_returning detection
- ✅ All Phase 1 backend support (commit 619b272)

TEST ENDPOINT VERIFIED:
- URL: https://calendarbeaf-test.azurewebsites.net/api/visitor/track
- Status: 200 OK ✅
- Returns: {success: true, tracked: true, is_first_time: true, visitor_id: "uuid"}

YOU CAN NOW:
1. Point your frontend to TEST backend
2. Test the complete welcome flow
3. Verify visitor_id tracking in MongoDB
4. Test all 4 entry states

NEXT STEPS:
- Test Phase 1 integration end-to-end
- Report any issues you find
- Once verified, we can coordinate Phase 2/3 deployment

Let me know how testing goes!
